wikipedia_page.main:
Kyle Bradley (born 14 February 1999) is a Scottish footballer who last played for East Kilbride in the Lowland League.
He also spent spells at Rangers, on loan at Clyde and Annan Athletic.

link_mentions.page: Rangers F.C. B Team and Academy

response: Kyle Bradley (born 1982) is an American mixed martial artist.
Kyle Bradley may also refer to:
* Kyle Bradley Lipton, the name of the protagonist of Dr. Dimensionpants
